hotel_name: Hotel SPA Husseren Collections - Proche Colmar - Eguisheim
text_description:
The hotel, with terraces southerly oriented, is located between vineyards and forest, at the foothills of the ruins of the three castles in the heart of Alsace, on the wine-road, 6 km from Colmar, 70 km from Strasbourg.

The establishment boasts a bistronomic restaurant, "Bain de Forêt", with a terrace featuring forest views. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, and bright seminar rooms with professional material and Wi-Fi access.

Staff at the Hotel Restaurant & Spa Husseren Collections speak English, German, Danish and Italian. Nine charging stations (including 3 tesla) for electric cars are available at this property.

Parking is available and for free.

Located in the village of Eguisheim in the Alsace region, this hotel features modern rooms with private bathroom and a traditional restaurant. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel.

The soundproofed rooms at Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hairdryer and free bathroom toiletries are also provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Alsatian food with à la carte menus.

Eguisheim centre is only 300 metres away and Colmar SNCF Train Station is 6 km from the property. German frontier is very close and Freiburg is 1 hour’s drive.

hotel_name: La Grange du Pape - Annexe de l'Hôtel La Ferme du Pape
text_description:
La Grange du Pape - Annexe de l'Hôtel La Ferme du Pape is located in Eguisheim, within 6.5 km of House of the Heads and 7 km of Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is situated 10 km from Colmar Expo, 35 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 39 km from Parc Expo Mulhouse. The property is non-smoking and is set 5.7 km from Colmar Train Station.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast city views. All guest rooms in La Grange du Pape - Annexe de l'Hôtel La Ferme du Pape are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Mulhouse Train Station is 41 km from the accommodation. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 54 km from the property.
address: 13 Rue du Rempart Nord , 68920 Eguisheim, France

text_description:
Set at the heart of the medieval village of Eguisheim, the Hostellerie du Château is located on the Alsace wine route. It offers individually decorated guest rooms with free fibre-optic WiFi access.

Each guest room is equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. The tiled private bathrooms feature a bathtub.

At L'Hostellerie du Château, a continental buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room.

L'Hostellerie du Château is located 6 km from Colmar City Centre and Strasbourg Airport is 87 km away. Guests can visit the 3 castles in the village, just a short walk away.

Offering views of the city, Auberge du Rempart is a family-run inn situated in the historic centre of Eguisheim in the Alsace Region.The property is 100 metres from Eguisheim Christmas Market.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer and a shower or a bath.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at an extra cost. Guests can also enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant or on the terrace during nice weather.

Basel Airport is 52 km from the property.
address: 1 rue du rempart sud, 68420 Eguisheim, France

text_description:
This hotel is located 200 metres from the city centre of Eguisheim, a 10-minute drive from Colmar. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking.

The rooms at the Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim are also equipped with TVs and some have private balconies.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast.

The Alsace wine route and the Vosges Mountains are easily accessible from Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim.
address: 2 rue des Trois Châteaux, 68420 Eguisheim, France

hotel_name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances Le Clos d'Eguisheim
text_description:
Résidence Pierre & Vacances Le Clos D'Eguisheim is located 700 metres from Eguisheim village centre, in the Alsace region along the Alsace Wine Route. It offers a heated, indoor swimming pool and fully equipped apartments.

Each apartment is fully furnished with a terrace or loggia with garden furniture, a separate living area and a private bathroom. The kitchens include a vitroceramic cooking hob, fridge and coffee maker. WiFi access is available for a fee. A bakery services is available at a surcharge.

The Résidence Pierre & Vacances overlooks the Three Keeps Hill. It is located just 6.5 km from Colmar city centre and 30 km from the German border. Private parking is available at an extra cost and guests can rent books and board games free of charge.

Green Key-awarded.

James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is located among the vineyards of Eguisheim. It offers a spectacular view of the Black Forest.

The establishment is equipped with two pools, one outdoor heated to 29°C (Closed in winter, open according to weather conditions and seasons). Our relaxing area is open and has one indoor swimming pool which is heated to 29°C, it also has a Jacuzzi and a panoramic sauna at an extra cost. Bath robes, towels and flip flops are proposed to our guests at the Front Desk, with a supplementary price.

There are 31 furnished rooms with a private bathroom. Each room at the James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is equipped with a TV, telephone, air-conditioning and minibar.

A breakfast buffet with sweet and savoury options is available daily. Breakfast must be reserved upon arrival. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Parking is in extra at 8€ per day on site. You will find a choice of restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 500 meters away.

The wellness area is open from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. This private space has an additional cost of €11 for all ages.

For suite vignes, rooms Deluxe and rooms superior, extra beds are available upon request for an additional charge of 25 per bed, per night. The sofa bed can be used with an additional cost of €30 as mentioned into the fine print.

hotel_name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim
text_description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim is located at the gate of a charming village, in the heart of vineyards and a gourmet region. The hotel is situated 8 km from Colmar.

Rooms at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim feature traditional decor and are equipped with modern amenities such as free WiFi  access.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim offers a shaded terrace where you can savour local specialities accompanied with wines from the region.

The hotel features a lift, free private parking and facilities for the disabled. The golf course and the tennis courts are 5 km from the hotel and the town swimming pool is 6 km away.

Featuring free, high-speed WiFi throughout the property, B&B Hôtel Colmar offers pet-friendly accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 minutes' drive from Colmar. Free private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite and beIN sport channels. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh bread with Nutella or jam is served every morning at a surcharge. Guests can also sample eggs and bacon on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 41 km from B&B Hôtel Colmar, while Gérardmer is 32 km away. Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is 56 km from the property.

Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

Set in the middle of the Alsatian vineyards, Hotel Restaurant Cristal offers accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 km from Colmar. Guests can enjoy the on-site, traditional-style restaurant and relax using free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Every room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

There is room service at the property.Free private parking is available on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 43 km from Hotel Restaurant Cristal, while Gérardmer is 30 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 56 km from the property.

hotel_name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances La Petite Venise
text_description:
Located in the heart of Colmar in the Little Venice district, Pierre & Vacances La Petite Venise offers an indoor swimming pool with paddling pool and garden with play area. Colmar Train Station is 650 meters away.

Each accommodation is decorated in a contemporary style and features a seating area and TV. Most offer a balcony or terrace, upon availability. The kitchen is equipped with an oven or microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator.

A breakfast can be enjoyed each morning at an extra cost in the property's breakfast room, which also features a terrace. Baked goods can be delivered to your room and must be ordered the evening before at reception.

Eguisheim is 10 km away and Bâle-Mulhouse-Fribourg Airport is 56 km from the accommodation

Grand Hôtel Bristol is located in Colmar, facing the historical TGV train station. It offers a fitness and spa centre, hammam and massage treatments. The property is 1.1 km from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

The air-conditioned rooms with traditional or contemporary decor are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

L'Auberge Brasserie serves traditional Alsace dishes with regional wines. A buffet breakfast is prepared daily. Guests have a choice of a buffet breakfast served in the lounge or a continental breakfast served in their room

Grand Hôtel Bristol has a limited private underground parking at an extra cost and subject to reservation. Other public parking lots can be found at a few minutes' walk.
address: 7 place de La Gare, 68000 Colmar, France

text_description:
Set in Wettolsheim, 4.2 km from Colmar Train Station, CHATEAU R offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 4.9 km of House of the Heads. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 5.3 km from CHATEAU R, while Colmar Expo is 8 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 56 km from the property.

This hotel is located in Alsace region a 10-minute drive from Colmar and from the centre of Eguisheim. It offers a goumet-style restaurant that serves seasonal dishes and en suite rooms with a telephone and TV. Free Wi-Fi is available.

La Palette’s restaurant serves traditional French food that guests can enjoy on the terrace during nice weather. There is also a bar that serves a variety of drinks.

Additional facilities and services include a children’s game room located in the restaurant, as well as an on site gift shop and bicycle rental.

It is 30 km from Haut-Kœnigsbourg Castle and an 11-minute drive from the Unterlinden Museum. Free private parking is available.

Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice. It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine. Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property. Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

Set in Turckheim, 6.3 km from House of the Heads, Les Portes de la Vallee offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.4 km from Colmar Train Station.

Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at the hotel have a balcony. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Les Portes de la Vallee offers a children's playground.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 6.7 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Expo is 7.5 km away. EuroAirport Mulhouse Airport is 60 km from the property.

Hotel Primo Colmar Centre is located at the centre of Colmar, just 300 metres from the Unterlinden Museum and the Christmas market, and 5 minutes' drive from Colmar Expo and the Bartholdi's Statue of Liberty. It offers free WiFi access.

The contemporary rooms feature a private bathroom and a TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception.

Public parking is available in front of the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre at an extra cost. It is just 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station. You can also travel the 15-minute drive to the famous vineyards on the Alsace Wine Route.

The Berceau Du Vigneron is located in the heart of the Alsace vineyard 7 kilometres west of Colmar. Guests can relax in the hotel’s bar with a free newspaper. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms at the property are decorated with wooden furniture and feature a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

From May to October, guests can participate in nighttime tours of the city.

The Berceau du Vigneron is located near several vineyards on the Alsatian Wine Route, where guests can sample the regional produce. The hotel is just 15 minutes from Colmar town centre and Colmar-Houssen Airport.

This 16th-century post office has been transformed into a charming hotel. Located along the Alsace wine-trail,Le Domaine de Rouffach (ex Ville de Lyon) features a heated indoor pool close to all rooms, an infrared cabin, a hot tub, a gourmet restaurant by Philippe Bohrer and a brasserie by Julien.

Each room at the Domaine de Rouffach is elegantly decorated and equipped with a TV with Canal + and beIN Sport channels, a hairdryer and a telephone. A full buffet breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms.

Colmar, the wine capital of Alsace, isn’t far from the hotel and makes the perfect daytrip. After an enjoyable day wine-tasting, chef Philippe Bohrer welcomes you to try some refined cuisine in the gourmet restaurant. Guests may also enjoy a dinner in the property's brasserie, chez Julien.

The hotel’s bar, Le coin d'Antan, is a cosy place to relax and have a drink. Guests can also enjoy the outdoor terrace and the wellness area.

Le Domaine de Rouffach also provides free on-site parking and bicycle rental .

Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

hotel_name: Résidence Les Rives de la Fecht - Colmar Ouest
text_description:
Located at the beginning of the Alsace Wine Route, this residence is set in a small forest with views of the Vosges Mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. Riquewihr and Colmar Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive away.

The apartments and studios at Résidence Les Rives de la Fetch have a seating area with an LCD TV. Bed linen and towels are provided once and free of charge.

Meals can be prepared in your accommodation’s kitchenette, which is equipped with an oven and hotplates. Alternatively the residence offers a buffet breakfast and also has a restaurant, Aux Berges de la Fecht.

Massage treatments can be arranged at the property. Free private parking is available on site. Other local villages include Kaysersberg and Ribeauvillé, both less than a 15-minute drive away.
address: 18 quai de la Fecht, 68040 Ingersheim, France

text_description:
This hotel is located in the North of Colmar, 5 km from the city centre. It offers air conditioning, free WiFi access and an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast.

Each soundproofed room at the B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière offers modern facilities including cable on a flat-screen TV. It also has private bathroom.

Free parking is provided at the Hôtel Roi Soleil, making it easy to explore Colmar and the surrounding Alsatian vineyards by car.
address: 1B rue des Frères Lumière, 68000 Colmar, France

text_description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.
